batch_name: Batch 3 Part 2 FULL: Cronies & Legal Professionals
note: Complete re-extraction of previously summarized batch. Full entity extraction matching Batch 1 quality standards. This batch contains 58 critical profiles with extensive legal, business, and family relationship data.

profiles.name: Alan Courtney Greenberg
profiles.birth_details: raised in upper middle-class Jewish family
profiles.summary: Raised Oklahoma City upper middle-class Jewish family. Pursued Wall Street career. Rose through ranks at Bear Stearns: CEO 1978-1993, Chairman 1985-2001. Non-executive director Viacom. Oversaw Bear Stearns collapse March 2008. Sold stake for $50M. 2008 signed lucrative JPMorgan contract as vice chairman emeritus, 40% trading commissions.

profiles.name: James E Cayne
profiles.summary: Started career as traveling salesman, then sold scrap iron and municipal bonds. 1969 playing bridge full-time in NYC when Alan C. Greenberg hired him as stockbroker at Bear Stearns. By 1993 became CEO of Bear Stearns, held position until January 2008 (just before firm's demise in March 2008). Succeeded by Alan Schwartz. Named in Time Magazine's list of '25 People to Blame for the Financial Crisis'.

profiles.name: A. Alfred Taubman
profiles.summary: Real estate developer who enlarged his empire. Played white knight role buying Woodward & Lothrop department store chain in Washington and Sotheby's international auction house. Cut Wexner and Milton Petrie in on Sotheby's deal. 1985 refinancing of Taubman Company's shopping malls left Taubman with $650 million cash kitty. Rumors that he and Wexner were after $10 billion Federated Department Stores chain.

profiles.name: Steven Jude Hoffenberg
profiles.summary: Early business associate of JE. According to Hoffenberg introduced by Douglas Leese (defense contractor). JE claimed introduced by John Mitchell (late attorney general). Chief of Towers Corp, began using company funds to pay off earlier investors and service lavish lifestyle: mansion on Long Island, homes on Manhattan's Sutton Place and Florida, fleet of cars and planes. 1993 owned NY Post for 3 months. March 1993 tenure ended after mass layoffs, staff walkout, missed publications, bankruptcy. 1994 bragged about Clinton campaign donations. March 7 1997 pled guilty to bilking investors $475M, given 20 year sentence. Released October 2013. July 10 2014 married NY Post News President Maria Santiago after one month romance, ceremony at Trump Tower Manhattan. May 2016 filed suit against JE for restitution for stealing while at Towers Corp.

profiles.name: Douglas Leese
profiles.summary: Allegedly introduced JE to Hoffenberg. Master Trustee of Tedder's Foreign Security Trust Program offered through Leading Minds International/MyGivingTree and Mariner International Bank. Allegedly some secret commissions on Al Yamamah deal handled by British Aerospace through Leese who has close connections with Bank of NT Butterfield in Bermuda. Made fortune putting together defence packages for governments worldwide. While living in Miami 1997 sued Moores' family and National Securities Management/Hambros Bank alleging they stole and converted highly confidential records, surreptitiously removed sensitive information, contacted persons in telephone records under false pretences. 2009 Honorary Consul of St. Vincent and the Grenadines.

profiles.name: Gary Kenneth King
profiles.summary: JE bought land from him to build NM ranch, donated to his campaign. Attorney General of New Mexico January 1 2007 to January 1 2015. Lost election bid for Governor of New Mexico in 2014. Son of Bruce King (three-time Governor of New Mexico). 1998 became Policy Advisor to Assistant Secretary for Environmental Management at U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) in Washington, D.C.

profiles.name: George John Mitchell Jr.
profiles.summary: US Senator friend of JE who, according to Alan Dershowitz, kept a regular 'room' at JE's Palm Beach mansion. Father George John Mitchell Sr. (born Joseph Kilroy) was ethnic Irish but adopted by Lebanese family when orphaned. Father was janitor at Colby College Waterville. Mother Mary (n√©e Saad) was textile worker who emigrated from Bkassine, Lebanon in 1920 at age 18. Recognized as prominent Arab-American. Served US Army 1954-1956, rising to First Lieutenant. Received law degree from Georgetown University Law Center part-time program at night. Trial attorney for Antitrust Division US Dept of Justice Washington 1960-1962. Executive assistant to Senator Edmund S. Muskie 1962-1965. US Senator from Maine 1980-1995, Senate Majority Leader 1989-1995. Director: Walt Disney, Federal Express, Xerox, Unilever, Staples, Starwood Hotels, Boston Red Sox. After Senate joined Verner, Liipfert, Bernhard, McPherson and Hand DC, became chairman. Criticized for lobbying for Big Tobacco. Senior counsel Preti, Flaherty, Beliveau, Pachios, Orlick & Haley Portland Maine. Partner and Chairman Global Board DLA Piper US LLP. Advisor ZeniMax Media Inc. Co-chairman (with Newt Gingrich) of Task Force on United Nations, released findings June 15 2005. January 22 2009 President Obama and Sec State Hillary Clinton appointed Special Envoy to Arab-Israeli peace process (Special Envoy for Middle East Peace).

profiles.name: Robert A. Meister
profiles.summary: Allegedly introduced JE to Les Wexner who was a client at Meister's insurance firm. Vice Chairman Aon Risk Services Companies Inc. (subsidiary of Aon Corporation) since 1991. Prior: Vice Chairman Sedgwick James 1985-1991, Alexander & Alexander 1975-1985. Managing Trustee Hunt Mortgage Group (parent of Centerline Capital Group). Director Universal Health Services Inc. Independent Trustee Ramco-Gershenson Properties Trust 1996-May 6 2014. Board of Trustees Centerline Holding Company since November 2003. March 1991-January 2010 Vice Chairman Aon Group Inc. Became Vice Chairman Emeritus Aon Group Inc January 2010. Board of Directors Universal Health Services Inc July 2004-May 2008.

profiles.name: Flavio Briatore
profiles.summary: Circled in JE address book. Italian businessman. Started career as restaurant manager and insurance salesman in Italy. When Benetton opened first five stores in US 1979, appointed Briatore as director of group's American operations. Convicted in Italy on several fraud charges 1980s, though convictions successively extinguished by amnesty. After appeal 1987 sentence reduced to 1 year 2 months. To avoid imprisonment lived in Saint Thomas, Virgin Islands. Never went to prison, returned to EU after both convictions extinguished by amnesty. Set up successful Benetton franchises as fugitive in Virgin Islands and US. 1990 promoted by Luciano Benetton to manager of Benetton Formula One racing team, which became Renault F1 in 2002. Created Billionaire brand 1998, owns club in Sardinia (since closed). August 2012 opened Billionaire Club in Marbella plus haute couture line Billionaire Italian Couture. 2004 opened Cipriani's restaurant Mayfair London. Until 2007 owned 48.9% of pharmaceuticals company Pierrel. 2007-2010 part-owner and chairman London's Queens Park Rangers F.C. Was on ING Renault F1 team but due to involvement in race fixing at 2008 Singapore Grand Prix forced to resign. 2010 Turin court ordered Briatore rehabilitated, which by Italian Criminal Code results in extinction of any criminal effect of conviction. Operates Tuscan beach club and Lion in the Sun (holiday resort Kenya). Beneficiary of Autumn Sailing Ltd which purchased super yacht Force Blue from Home Shopping Network investor Roy Speer for ¬£68.2m.

profiles.name: Arnold Paul Prosperi
profiles.summary: JE crony who visited him in jail. 2001 disbarred Palm Beach attorney made headlines when five-year federal prison sentence commuted to three years house arrest by former President Bill Clinton. The two were college buddies. Former real estate attorney suffered from rare autoimmune disorder myasthenia gravis. Convicted November 1997 of filing false tax returns and creating counterfeit securities. PBP probable cause affidavit mentions JE's private investigator who told victims he was called 'Paul'.

profiles.name: Barry Krischer
profiles.summary: Florida State Attorney during Epstein's case. Early 2006 stated that due to quality of evidence Epstein would only be charged with one count aggravated assault with no jail time, no requirement to register as sex offender, no restitution for victims. PBPD was unsatisfied and requested federal investigation. Also ran Florida's Crimes Against Children Unit. Wrote Assistant U.S. Attorney A. Marie Villafana (prosecutor handling federal matter): 'Glad we could get this worked out for reasons I won't put in writing. After this is resolved I would love to buy you a cup at Starbucks and have a conversation.' Re-hired a judge who was accused of sexual harassment and stepped down. Refused to prosecute police killing of Jerrod Miller. Was subpoenaed by US Commission of Civil Rights to investigate irregularities during 2000 election in Palm Beach County FL.

profiles.name: Alan Morton Dershowitz
profiles.summary: Renowned lawyer, Harvard professor, scholar of Constitutional law. Outspoken Israel supporter. Part of OJ Simpson's 'dream team' 1994. 1998 wrote book 'Sexual McCarthyism: Clinton, Starr, and the emerging constitutional crisis'. 2001 wrote 'Supreme Injustice: How the High Court Hijacked Election 2000'. Was to deliver keynote and accept Citizen of Year award at temple festive dinner September 6 2002 but cancelled after dinner chairman Alan Burstein learned Dershowitz agreed to serve as counsel to British law firm appealing Abdelbaset al-Megrahi conviction. 2005 when Palm Beach Police investigating Epstein's sexual abuse of dozen+ minor girls, coincidentally and remarkably Dershowitz personally collected and provided flight manifests of 'Lolita Express' to PBPD. 2007 helped broker JE's NPA with sweeping immunity provision for Epstein and 'any potential co-conspirators'. August 2011 contacted by defense, requested to cooperate and answer questions, lawyers warned they'd disclose reasons publicly but Dershowitz refused to cooperate. December 30 2014 Edwards and Cassell filed joinder motion wanting to add VA Roberts to their case, references Roberts' complaints against Dershowitz. December 31 2014 Politico reports on story. Dershowitz embarked on media campaign defending himself, called Roberts 'serial perjurer, serial liar & serial prostitute', accused her attorneys Brad Edwards and Paul Cassell of being unethical, claimed he'd file disbarment charges. Also said he had no involvement in JE's NPA and never visited JE's island without family present. Says Roberts is lying because she claimed she had sex with Bill Clinton on JE's island and Dershowitz swears Clinton never set foot on island. January 3 2015 Jack Scarola (attorney representing Edwards/Cassell) invited Dershowitz to cooperate but no response. January 5 2015 Dershowitz made motion to intervene on federal case (Jane Doe #1 et al v US 08-cv-80736) to strike proffer by VA Roberts (Jane Doe #3) mentioning Dershowitz. January 6 2015 Edwards and Cassell filed defamation suit against Dershowitz (Edwards and Cassell vs Dershowitz CACE 15-000072). February 25 2015 Jack Scarola sent friendly letter to Dershowitz attorney complaining of refusal to cooperate and improper conduct. Deposed October 15 2015. During deposition disclosed confidential settlement discussion with David Boies in which Boies privately assured Dershowitz he didn't believe client Virginia Roberts' claims. December 11 2015 ignoring confidentiality agreement filed affidavit detailing discussion to court. Roberts filed motion to sanction Dershowitz. Case settled April 8 2016.

profiles.name: Donald Hafele
profiles.summary: Palm Beach County Circuit Judge who ruled allowing subpoenaed JE's victim abortion records but in 2009 ordered Epstein's erect member couldn't be examined for civil lawsuit filed against him by women he abused. 2014 sided with JE over victims' attorney Brad Edwards, ruling there is no legal basis for Edwards' claims of abuse of process and malicious prosecution. The ruling stemmed from civil lawsuit that JE filed 2009 against Edwards, claiming Edwards used judicial system improperly in investigating Epstein for civil lawsuits Edwards filed on behalf of victims. JE dropped his lawsuit against Edwards August 2012. But Edwards forged on with his counterclaim, saying Epstein filed 'baseless and unsupportable claims' to get Edwards to back down from representing victims and force him to spend time, energy and resources on own defense.

profiles.name: Jay Lefkowitz
profiles.summary: Attorney who helped negotiate JE's NPA with Kenneth Starr in 2007. Father Jerome was labor lawyer who drafted New York's landmark Taylor Law. As white house aide 1995, while trying to defend Pat Robertson's 'The New World Order' which allegedly 'regurgitates decades-old conspiracy theories about all-powerful bankers who just happen to be Jewish', Lefkowitz made statement to NY Times: 'I don't see Pat Robertson as being opposed to Jewish interests. Deep down, I believe that a little anti-Semitism is good for Jews -- it reminds us who we are.' Mentioned in article featured on front page of NY Times in 2001 about Bush vs Kennedy re: stem cell research. Also served as Mid East envoy for GWB. 2003 left GWB administration to join law firm of Kirkland Ellis where he is made senior partner. 1991 married Elena Neuman (daughter of wealthy real estate mogul Herbert Neuman), they have 3 kids Talia, Danielle and Jacob.

profiles.name: Bruce E. Reinhart
profiles.summary: 1996-2008 distinguished former Assistant U.S. Attorney. His unexpected exit from United States Attorneys Office was surprising given timing. Asst US District Attorney in FL before leaving government to defend JE. He represented Sarah Kellen at time of her deposition in 2010. Reinhart moved to intervene in federal case to contest victims' allegations that Reinhart (a former prosecutor in U.S. Attorney's Office investigating Epstein) received confidential, non-public information about investigation. Victims specifically alleged that Reinhart had 'joined Epstein's payroll shortly after important decisions were made limiting Epstein's criminal liability' and that Reinhart had gone on to improperly represent Epstein-related witnesses in various civil suits. Reinhart filed sworn affidavit admitting that he had represented Epstein-related clients, but claiming that he did not possess any such confidential information. He sought to intervene to challenge victims' arguments but was denied by Court. He visited Epstein in prison July 2 2008 August 8 2008.

profiles.name: Kenneth Marra
profiles.summary: Federal Judge on Jane Doe #1 and Jane Doe #2 vs the United States, 08-80736-CIV-MARRA, in which JE's victims say their rights were violated by JE's NPA. On April 7, 2015, Marra ruled that allegations made by Roberts against Prince Andrew had no bearing on aim of lawsuit to reopen Epstein's non-prosecution agreement and should be struck from record. Judge Marra made no ruling as to whether claims by Roberts are true or false. Marra specifically stated that Roberts may later give evidence when case comes to court. President George W. Bush nominated Marra to United States District Court for Southern District of Florida to new seat created by 114 Stat. 2762. Currently ruling on Chiquita/Colombian Para-Military case.

Alex Acosta, federal prosecutor during Jeffrey Epstein criminal case, a Harvard University Law graduate, serves as law clerk to Judge Samuel Alito for US Court of Appeals for Third Circuit. 1995 R. Alex Acosta hired by Kirkland Ellis befriends Kenneth Starr. Worked at Kirkland Ellis with Ken Starr. On March 20, 2011 Acosta wrote 'whistle blowing' letter that was published in Daily Beast. It detailed unprecedented 'assault' by JE's defense lawyers against prosecutors office and Palm Beach police during time of JE's NPA in 2008.

profiles.name: Robert Workman Sweet
profiles.summary: Judge in VA Louise Roberts vs. Ghislaine Maxwell, and Hoffenberg vs. JE. American jurist, currently senior United States federal judge. Sweet was appointed to federal court for Southern District of New York by President Jimmy Carter and confirmed in 1978. He semi-retired into senior status in 1991. Sweet attended Yale University, he served as naval officer in World War II and then attended Yale Law School. There, he roomed with future NYC mayor John V. Lindsay. Started his law career at Simpson Thacher & Bartlett from 1949-1953. From 1953 to 1955, he was Assistant U.S. attorney in Southern District of New York. In 1955 he joined Casey Lane & Mittendorf. Founded Youth for Eisenhower organization with Lindsay. In 1959-60 he served on Rockefeller's Task Force on Youth and Juvenile Delinquency. In 1961 he was campaign manager for John J Gilhooley who was on same ticket as mayoral candidate Louis Lefkowitz. He served as deputy mayor to John V. Lindsay of New York City from 1966 to 1969, then spent several years as lawyer in private practice with global New York law firm of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom. One of Sweet's law clerks was Eliot Spitzer. In his 2003 case Pelman v McDonald's Corp a group of teenagers sued McDonald's, claiming food caused their obesity. Sweet dismissed case and said 'it is not the place of the law to protect them against their own excesses'. Also ruled siding with NY Times they didn't have to disclose their sources. Married Lois Clapp in 1948. Lived in 433 E 85th St townhouse and was neighbors with Max Abramovitz, UN architect. His grandfather was state senator and his uncle George was aide to camp to FDR in Navy. His father James d 1963 was attorney at Davis Polk & Wardwell. Childhood friends with Lloyd Taft, investment banker son of Senator Robert Taft.

profiles.name: Bradley J Edwards
profiles.summary: Attorney representing VA Roberts and several Jane Doe victims of Jeffrey Epstein. A partner at Farmer, Jaffe, Weissing, Edwards, Fistos & Lehrman in Ft. Lauderdale, in 2014 Edwards earned Florida Bar Certification, highest level of recognition for competency and experience of civil trial attorney. Of 90,000 practicing lawyers in Florida, only 1% earn this certification. On July 7 2008 on behalf of Epstein's victims, his clients, Edwards filed federal lawsuit claiming US government had violated his clients rights as victims by executing special Non-Prosecution agreement for Epstein. Edwards informed JE's attorneys that he intended to take depositions from: Bill Clinton, Donald Trump, David Copperfield, Bill Richardson. On January 6 2015 Edwards and Cassell file defamation suit against Dershowitz when he tries to have his involvement stricken from record. On August 12, 2008, at request of his client Jane Doe, Edwards filed civil suit against JE for damages. Before this, Jane Doe had sued JE in civil court for $50 million with law firm Herman and Mermelstein (Jane Doe #4 v Epstein). Included in this complaint was RICO count that explained how Epstein ran criminal conspiracy to procure young girls for him to sexually abuse.

profiles.name: Marie Villafa√±a
profiles.summary: In mid June of 2008, Edwards contacted AUSA Villafa√±a to inform her that he represented Jane Doe #1 (Elena Weber) and, later, Jane Doe #2 (L.M.). AUSA Villafa√±a did not advise that plea agreement had already been negotiated with Epstein's attorneys that would block federal prosecution. To contrary, AUSA Villafa√±a mentioned possible indictment. AUSA Villafa√±a did indicate that federal investigators had concrete evidence and information that Epstein had sexually molested many underage minor females. Edwards also requested from U.S. Attorney's Office information they had collected regarding Epstein's sexual abuse of his clients. However, U.S. Attorney's Office declined to provide any such information to Edwards. On Friday, June 27, 2008, at approximately 4:15 p.m., AUSA Villafafia received copy of Epstein's proposed state plea agreement and learned that plea was scheduled for 8:30 a.m., Monday, June 30, 2008. AUSA Villafafia called Edwards to provide notice to his clients regarding hearing. AUSA Villafafia did not tell Attorney Edwards that guilty pleas in state court would bring end to possibility of federal prosecution pursuant to plea agreement. 2017 who is now U.S. Attorney under Attorney General Eric Holder.

profiles.name: Drew Oosterbaan
occupations: Chief of Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section
profiles.summary: Helped USAO draft JE's NPA. Chief of Department of Justice's Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section (CEOS). Drew Oosterbaan has been Chief of Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section (CEOS) of U.S. Department of Justice since 2001. CEOS leverages expertise of its prosecutors and computer forensic specialists to develop and prosecute high-impact child exploitation cases, national and frequently international in scope, involving most prolific and dangerous offenders. In 2003, Drew led CEOS in partnership with FBI and National Center for Missing and Exploited Children to design and implement Innocence Lost Initiative, nationwide, federal-local joint law enforcement strategy to investigate and prosecute traffickers exploiting minors through prostitution.
